text: Absolutely Seriously () is a 1961 Soviet adventure film directed by Eldar Ryazanov, Vladimir Semakov, Naum Trakhtenberg, Eduard Zmojro and Leonid Gaidai.ПРОГРАММА ТРЕТЬЕГО ДНЯ МЕЖДУНАРОДНОГО ФЕСТИВАЛЯ КНИГАМАРТСамый любимый Трус всего Советского СоюзаТрус, Балбес и Бывалый: 55 лет назад мы впервые увидели знаменитую эксцентричную «троицу» == Plot == The film is a comedy almanac, which includes several short stories.Совершенно серьезно == Cast == *Anatoli Papanov as editor (segment "Kak sozdavalsya Robinzon") * Sergey Filippov as writer Moldavantsev (segment "Kak sozdavalsya Robinzon") *Zinovy Gerdt as narrator (segment "Kak sozdavalsya Robinzon") *Rostislav Plyatt as customer (segment Istoriya s pirozhkami") *Aleksandr Belyavsky as journalist Frank (segment "Inostrantsy") * Svetlana Kharitonova as cashier Tonechka (segment "Istoriya s pirozhkami") *Yevgeny Morgunov as Experienced (segment "Pyos Barbos i neobychniy kross") * Yuri Nikulin as Booby (segment "Pyos Barbos i neobychniy kross") *Georgy VitsinСовершенно серьёзно (1961) Full Cast & Crew as Coward (segment "Pyos Barbos i neobychniy kross") == References == == External links == * Category:1961 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet films
